overview: A film shot entirely during six peak weeks as COVID-19 hits the world - and the small Arctic town of Troms√∏. The filmmaker follows a group of individuals, that each in their own way are trying to grasp, interpret and cope with their existence being turned upside down. As apocalypse looms and one snow storm after another hits their town, their paths collide. What awaits on the other side?
title: Alt blir bra?
